item.title: Discover financial products in Malaysia with GoBear
item.description: GoBear, a metasearch engine that simplifies financial product comparison, has officially launched in Malaysia. The platform offers unbiased, side-by-side comparisons of products like travel insurance and credit cards, with over 1,000 options currently listed and more to come. Iskandar Ezzahuddin, GoBear’s Country Director for Malaysia, emphasized the platform’s mission: “GoBear stems from the understanding that modern consumers demand convenient access to service information and straightforward product comparisons before making financial decisions.

item.title: Idealo has developed a flight price comparison portal for India
item.description: Source: idealo India website. Idealo, a company specializing in price comparison, has expanded its services to India. With fourteen successful price comparison websites globally, idealo already helps numerous travelers find the best flight deals. The company proudly launched its fifteenth website,Â flights.idealo.in, in 2015. Indian customers can now compare prices on thousands of flights from various online travel agencies and airlines, all without any cost. Idealo’s platform features offers from both budget-friendly and high-end airlines, encompassing one-way and round-trip journeys.

item.title: Check out Rahlat.com for the best travel prices in Arabic
item.description: Source: Rahlat.com website. Screen capture of the home page. Rahlat.com is an Arabic travel search website designed by Arabs, for Arabs. Its goal is to help travelers in the Middle East and Gulf region find the best prices on flights and hotels. This free, independent metasearch engine is available in both Arabic and English, making it easy for users to compare prices from numerous travel and airline websites with just one click.

item.title: Understand your social media presence with Socialbakers' Social Health Index
item.description: Socialbakers, a company specializing in social media analytics and optimization, has launched its Social Health Index, a tool created in collaboration with Lenovo. This industry benchmark offers brands a single metric to assess their social marketing performance across multiple platforms. It allows them to effortlessly measure their overall social media presence and compare it to their competitors over a period of time. Jan Rezab, CEO and Co-Founder of Socialbakers, stated that the Social Health Index is the first benchmark of its kind, providing context to brands’ social marketing efforts.

item.title: The Huawei P10 Plus has the potential to serve as a substitute for a digital SLR camera
item.description: Fashion and beauty photographer Richard Chen, also a Leica Akademie Instructor, believes the Huawei P10 Plus offers the capabilities of a professional camera in a pocket-sized device. During a Huawei P10 Plus Masterclass held in Singapore, Chen, a professional Leica photographer, shared his growing preference for the Huawei P10 Plus’s mobile camera over traditional cameras for personal photography. He appreciates the portability and convenience of the smartphone, noting, “If I’m exploring I actually don’t bring the (conventional digital) camera nowadays… I’m starting to use it as the main camera.
